extensionDescription.message: Dormancy 'retires' tabs that have gone unused for a while. It restores the tabs to life when you next use them.

optionTimeout.description: Label for option for how many minutes to wait before putting tabs to sleep.

optionActiveWindow.description: Label for option for whether to put tabs to sleep in the active window.

optionExcludedWebsites.message: Prevent the following websites from being retired
optionExcludedWebsites.description: Comma separated list of websites URLs.
